document.full_text: the hearing on the players' request for an injunction to halt the lockout begins wednesday and will hinge on whether the judge believes the union's decertification was legitimate, or a tactic.
document.title: n.f.l. and players head to court to argue lockout
lines_and_colors: the hearing on the players' request for an injunction to halt the lockout begins wednesday and will hinge on whether the judge believes the union's decertification was legitimate, or a tactic.
